member_organisations:
The Mediation Center was established by law at the Croatian Insurance Bureau, members of the latter may be accessed through the following link: 
http://www.huo.hr/eng/members/48/
fields_of_interest: Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
eu_initiatives:
- Directive 2013/11/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 May 2013 on Alternative Dispute Resolution for Consumer Disputes and Amending Regulation (EC) No 2006/2004, and Directive 2009/22/EC 
- Regulation (EU) No 524/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 May 2013 on Online Dispute Resolution for Consumer Disputes and Regulation (EC) No2006/2004 and Directive 2009/22/EC 
-  Insurance Distribution Directive (IDD) 
- General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
organisation_name: Mediation Centre at the Croatian Insurance Bureau (CMHUO)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
- organising Round Tables, Panel Disussions relating to ADR 
- education of insurance staff 
- lectures for highschool and faculty students - financial literacy comprises alternative dispute resolution - Mediation, Ombudsman
goals__remit:
- to enable out-of-court settlements of disputes arising out of insurance and reinsurance relations under insurance contracts i.e. the Law by means of mediation 
- to encourage mediation as the primary way of dispute resolution 
- the implementation and support of EU politics concerning alternative dispute resolution
